lines.text: Snell’s law is applied multiple times

secText:
Lesson:
1. Determine the [OBJ:expsec_u260:direction of refraction].
2. Determine the angle of refraction when light moves through [OBJ:expsec_u263:multiple media].
3. [OBJ:expsec_u261:Describe] why refraction occurs.
4. Apply the concept of refraction to [OBJ:pwsec_u262:refraction in water].
5. Describe and calculate how the [OBJ:expsec_u264:wavelength of light] changes as it moves through different materials.
